sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AgentWorkspaceNotificationTriggerTableChoices</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point global.NotificationTriggerTableChoices. Excludes system tables for "agent_workspace" view.</description>
        <name>AgentWorkspaceNotificationTriggerTableChoices</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AgentWorkspaceNotificationTriggerTableChoices = Class.create();
AgentWorkspaceNotificationTriggerTableChoices.prototype = {
    initialize: function(view) {
		this.view = view;
    },
	
	handles: function(){
		return this.view == 'agent_workspace';
	},

    process: function() {
		var noSystemTables = new NoSystemTableChoiceList();
		return noSystemTables.process();
    },

    type: 'AgentWorkspaceNotificationTriggerTableChoices'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-10-08 00:29:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1f0d4605ff012300294153bd6338f1af</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AgentWorkspaceNotificationTriggerTableChoices</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agent Workspace - Main Configuration" source="com.snc.agent_workspace.config">2d887ca03cf1311068bcf327dfe37f55</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1f0d4605ff012300294153bd6338f1af</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-10-08 00:58:27</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
